solution_line_template: Lee and his friend had a total of ${lee_money} + ${friend_money} = $<<{lee_money}+{friend_money}={total_initial_money}>>{total_initial_money}.

The cost of the food was ${chicken_wings_cost} + ${chicken_salad_cost} + ${soda_cost_per_item} + ${soda_cost_per_item} = $<<{chicken_wings_cost}+{chicken_salad_cost}+{soda_cost_per_item}+{soda_cost_per_item}={total_food_cost}>>{total_food_cost}.
The total cost, including tax was ${total_food_cost} + ${tax_amount} = $<<{total_food_cost}+{tax_amount}={total_cost_with_tax}>>{total_cost_with_tax}.
They should have received ${total_initial_money} - ${total_cost_with_tax} = $<<{total_initial_money}-{total_cost_with_tax}={change_received}>>{change_received} in total.
